alert.note: Alert for Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 05 at 6:57PM EST until January 06 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Rough River near Dundee affecting Ohio County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rough River near Dundee. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, County roads between Dundee and Narrows flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 PM CST Thursday the stage was 25.7 feet. - The river crested yesterday at 27.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued when the warning is cancelled.
